data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne drives forward and Ryad Boudebouz gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 3, Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Mikael Lesage signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Nimes's area.
Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Saint-Etienne push upfield but Mikael Lesage quickly pulls them for offside.
Mikael Lesage awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne's Harold Moukoudi scores with his head to give his side a 1-0 lead.
That's a fine assist from Ryad Boudebouz.
In the minute 9, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Nimes just outside Saint-Etienne's area.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Zinedine Ferhat of Nimes gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 10, Saint-Etienne have a goal kick.
In Saint Etienne Saint-Etienne attack through Wahbi Khazri. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Etienne.
In the minute 13, Nimes have a dangerous throw-in.
Mikael Lesage signals a Nimes throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Matteo Ahlinvi levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Nimes at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
The home team replace Wahbi Khazri with Adil Aouchiche.
Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Corner awarded to Nimes.
In the minute 21, Saint-Etienne needs to be cautious. Nimes have an attacking throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ryad Boudebouz.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 23, Ryad Boudebouz is back on his feet again.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Mikael Lesage awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Romain Hamouma for Saint-Etienne has been booked by Mikael Lesage and receives a first yellow card.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Niclas Eliasson is booked for the away team.
In the minute 32, Saint-Etienne are coming forward and Arnaud Nordin gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
An attacking Saint-Etienne player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 35, Nimes's Baptiste Reynet has been booked in Saint Etienne.
Saint-Etienne were awarded a penalty ... Which Ryad Boudebouz failed to convert!
Saint-Etienne's Romain Hamouma breaks free at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Etienne.
Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
In Saint Etienne Saint-Etienne drive forward through Yvan Neyou. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 38, Mikael Lesage signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Nimes's half.
Saint-Etienne are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne close to the penalty box.
In the minute 39, Nimes have a goal kick.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Saint-Etienne in Saint Etienne.
In the minute 44, Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Saint-Etienne are pushing forward but Mahdi Camara's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Mikael Lesage awards Nimes a goal kick.
Mikael Lesage will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Can Saint-Etienne capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nimes's half?
In the minute 45, Sidy Sarr returns to the field for Nimes after picking up a slight injury.
Mikael Lesage blows to end the first-half.
Attention is being given to Nimesâ€™s Sidy Sarr and play has been suspended briefly.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Saint-Etienne.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Nimes.
Corner awarded to Nimes.
In the minute 49, Arnaud Nordin (Saint-Etienne) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Nimes goal kick.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Mikael Lesage signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Nimes's area.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 52, Free kick Nimes.
Jerome Arpinon is making the team's first substitution at Stade Geoffroy Guichard with Renaud Ripart replacing Haris Duljevic.
Karim Aribi is replacing Nolan Roux for Nimes at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 53, Can Nimes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
Penalty! Mikael Lesage points to the spot, great chance for Nimes...
Goal! Renaud Ripart gives Nimes a 1-2 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 58, In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Saint-Etienne needs to be cautious. Nimes have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Nimes close to the penalty box.
In the minute 60, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nimes close to the penalty box.
Niclas Eliasson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Nimes.
Throw-in high up the field for Nimes in Saint Etienne.
In the minute 61, Free kick in a good position for Nimes!
Kelyan Guessoum's header is off-target for Nimes.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
In the minute 62, Saint-Etienne make their second substitution with Denis Bouanga replacing Romain Hamouma.
Jean-Philippe Krasso is on a sub for Ryad Boudebouz for Saint-Etienne.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, Goal! The home team draw level at 2-2 through Arnaud Nordin.
Adil Aouchiche instrumental with a fine assist.
Nimes have a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Free kick Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne's Denis Bouanga misses with an attempt on goal.
Mikael Lesage awards Nimes a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Nimes.
Sidy Sarr (Nimes) has received a yellow card from Mikael Lesage.
Saint-Etienne are caught offside.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Nimes.
In the minute 69, Jerome Arpinon (Nimes) is making a third substitution, with Lamine Fomba replacing Sidy Sarr.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In the minute 70, Mikael Lesage signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Saint-Etienne pushes forward through Adil Aouchiche, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In the minute 71, Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Saint-Etienne.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Sofiane Alakouch with Marco Ludivin Majouga. This is the fourth substitution made today by Jerome Arpinon.
Jerome Arpinon (Nimes) is making a fifth substitution, with Moussa Kone replacing Niclas Eliasson.
In Saint Etienne Nimes attack through Marco Ludivin Majouga. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the home team in Saint Etienne.
Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Saint-Etienne have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 78, Maxence Rivera is replacing Arnaud Nordin for the home team.
The home team have replaced Mahdi Camara with Lucas Gourna Douath. This is the fifth substitution made today by Claude Puel.
Mikael Lesage signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Nimes's half.
In the minute 80, Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nimes's Marco Ludivin Majouga gets in a shot on goal at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
In the minute 82, Nimes to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
At Stade Geoffroy Guichard, Yvan Neyou has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
In the minute 84, Goal kick for Nimes at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Nimes at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 86, Can Nimes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
Saint-Etienne needs to be cautious. Nimes have an attacking throw-in.
Mikael Lesage awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 87, Throw-in high up the field for Nimes in Saint Etienne.
Nimes have a dangerous throw-in.
Mikael Lesage signals a Nimes throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Mikael Lesage signals a throw-in for Saint-Etienne, close to Nimes's area.
Important block from the Nimes defence as Denis Bouanga fires in a strike for Saint-Etienne.
Saint-Etienne have been awarded a corner by Mikael Lesage.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Saint Etienne.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Saint-Etienne in Saint Etienne.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Throw-in for Nimes close to the penalty box.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
